amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow lawsuits in Federal court, rather than State court, against the final decision-maker who fails to exercise ordinary care decisions including employers, cap non-economic damages and prohibit punitive damages.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-366 to allow lawsuits in Federal court against the final decision-maker who fails to exercise ordinary care decisions including employers, caps non-economic damages and prohibits punitive damages.
